quote_first:
... You had no reason to think the times important. Indeed how suspicious it would be if you had been completely accurate.
"Haven't I been?"
"Not quite. It was
quote_last:
that you talked to Wilkins."
"Another ten minutes."
title: The Quiet American
author: Graham Greene
